title: Cat. 74  Two Maori Women Squatting Down, 1894/95, published February 3, 1895
publication_title: Gauguin Paintings, Sculpture, and Graphic Works at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">Two Maori Women Squatting Down  
1894/95, published Feb. 3, 1895  
Zincograph in black ink on cream wove paper; 280 × 380 mm  
The Art Institute of Chicago, gift of Edward McCormick Blair, 2002.264  
Guérin 87, Kornfeld 26 C  
For the verso, see fig. 74.1

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section provenance" id="provenance">Sold to Alice Adam Ltd., Chicago, for Edward McCormick Blair (1915–2010), Chicago, Apr. 23, 1986.

Given by Edward McCormick Blair to the Art Institute of Chicago, 2002.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section exhibitions" id="exhibitions">Art Institute of Chicago, Intimate Encounters: Paul Gauguin and the South Pacific; The Edward McCormick Blair Collection, Sept. 6, 2003–Jan. 11, 2004, cat. 39.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section references" id="references">Art Institute of Chicago, Intimate Encounters: Paul Gauguin and the South Pacific; The Edward McCormick Blair Collection, exhibition brochure (Art Institute of Chicago, 2003), cat. 39.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section other_documentation" id="other_documentation">Inscribed upper right, in graphite: arearea / gauguin

Inscribed lower right, in graphite: Gauguin “Deux femmes maories accroupies / G 87

Inscribed lower left, in graphite: G 162/II / PTE

Inscribed lower left, in graphite: #413

Stamped lower right, in black ink: 159 [sideways]

</section><section epub:type="footnotes" id="footnotes">Alice Adam Ltd., Chicago, invoice, Apr. 23, 1986, to Edward Blair, Sr., curatorial object file, Art Institute of Chicago.

</section><section id="figures">Cat. 74 Two Maori Women Squatting Down, 1894/95, published Feb. 3, 1895.

fig. 74.1 Verso of Gauguin’s Two Maori Women Squatting Down (1894/95). The Art Institute of Chicago, 2002.264.

</section>
